document.paragraph:
1Adding an attribute Once
10_opening_the_new_feature_dialog.xml the new feature dialog is displayed and attribute selected in feature type, follow the following steps:
../../../reference/70_wizards_and_dialogs/30_dialogs/10_new_feature_dialog/50_feature_properties_modification/00_feature_clauses.xml Choose a feature clause
../../../reference/70_wizards_and_dialogs/30_dialogs/10_new_feature_dialog/50_feature_properties_modification/10_name_field.xml Type a name
../../../reference/70_wizards_and_dialogs/30_dialogs/10_new_feature_dialog/50_feature_properties_modification/80_type_selection.xml Select the type
../../../reference/70_wizards_and_dialogs/30_dialogs/10_new_feature_dialog/50_feature_properties_modification/30_comment_field.xml Type a header comment
../../../reference/70_wizards_and_dialogs/30_dialogs/10_new_feature_dialog/50_feature_properties_modification/90_invariant_field.xml Select a class invariant
../../../reference/70_wizards_and_dialogs/30_dialogs/10_new_feature_dialog/50_feature_properties_modification/95_set_procedure.xml Select to create a set-procedure
